skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Mikazuki. I've got a lot of little and big sisters. We're all friends. I'm really good at escort and transport missions! Oh, and I love taiyaki! Do you want some too, Commander?
skins.acquisition: Aahh... Hm? Hmm? Co... main... der? I'm Mikazuki. Want some taiyaki? You can have half of mine.
skins.details: Commander, I still have lots of taiyaki, so I'm fine.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'm full... and sleepy... Commander, gimme a hug~
skins.secretaryIdle2: I like taiyaki filled with bean paste even in their tail fins.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Taiyaki looks like a fish... Fish live in the sea! Hm... the sea is on Earth! Earth is in space! Mm... so tasty!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, want some? I don't mind sharing.

skins.shipDescription: Mikazuki is supposed to be... a jiangshi? Um... hip... hop... Commander, trick or treaaaaat~
skins.acquisition: Mikazuki is supposed to be... a zombie? Um... hip... hop... Commander, trick or treaaaaat~
skins.login: Commander? If you don't give me taiyaki, I'll summon Minazuki~
skins.details: Getting changed is a pain, but since everyone wanted to see me in a costume, I did it... Hip, hop.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Bouncing around is exhausting. Commander, your lap please.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Halloween is all about witches, pumpkins, and... delicious taiyaki! Ommfh!
skins.secretaryIdle3: If the seal on my head gets removed, I'll turn into a real zombie... That's what Minazuki said, anyway.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, are you scared of zombies?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: My outfit is all messed up now... even though it took so long to put on...
